import React from "react"; export default class BookingModal extends React.Component { state = { tickets: this.props.tickets } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { if(prevProps.tickets !== this.props.tickets){ this.setState({ tickets:this.props.tickets }) } } render() { console.log("x") return (
